articles.title: Asteroid Alert: NASA Drops Impact Risk to Near Zero, But There’s One Small Catch - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA has all but ruled out asteroid 2024 YR4 as a danger to Earth, reducing its impact probability to just 0.004% in 2032. However, a small risk remains for the Moon. Scientists are seizing the moment to study the asteroid further, turning what was once a pot…
articles.content: Asteroid 2024 YR4 no longer poses a real threat to Earth, though it still has a slim chance of hitting the Moon in 2032. NASA is using the event to refine its planetary defense strategies and gather … [+2118 chars]
